column4: is it better to upgrade to 8.04 or do a clean install? or it dont matterr..
upgrade processes are less reliable than clean installs, no matter what distribution or operating system you're running, as a rule of thumb.
If you place a premium on convenience, try an upgrade.  If you place a premium on a clean system with no gotchas, clean install.
for a desktop system, a standard release is supported for 18 months.  Gusty is 7.10, which is 10/2007.  So for 18 months after that.
